name: Playground
description:
(2021, Edition of 1)

A spoken word, media-rich poem by award-winning poet Ana Maria Caballero.

Caballero's writing has won the Beverly International Prize for Literature, Colombia's José Miguel Arango National Poetry Prize + been a finalist for the Academy of American Poets Prize.

Her digital art was exhibited at Dreamverse and was awarded a Sevens Foundation grant. Her NFTs are available via Fort Gallery NFT, MONOGRAMA NFT Gallery, Async.Art, Foundation, Etherpoems, HEN. 

This poem was originally published by SWWIM and is part of Caballero's manuscript "Mammal," designated a Manuscript of Exceptional Merit by Tupelo Press.

anamariacaballero.com

Part of the inaugural collection of theVERSEverse.com. Designs commissioned from John Contreras
